docs.title: Welcome to drifty's docs!
docs.text: Hey there! I curate a bunch of links for stuff on here, and try to represent what I have learnt so others can also follow my steps

docs.title: Stuff to check out
docs.text: • My Services

docs.title: Other Links
docs.text:
• zx's archive for iOS sideloading
  • inotia00's ReVanced Extended for Android

docs.title: Welcome to my docs!
docs.text:
This place should serve as a link bucket mainly, for stuff I host or own, but it will also have handy guides to do everything I did with steps etc.

This is new, I'm still figuring it out, please bear with me and hopefully this is fruitful.

docs.title: Content Warning [drifty repack] updated to v1.17.b
docs.text:
Content Warning [drifty repack] has been updated to v1.17.b with the latest patch.

Just unpack this latest version and delete your older version to continue playing the game with the latest version.

Keep Steam open before launching the game.

Download Size: 388 MB

Unpacked Size: 1.11 GB

Click on "Content Warning.exe" to play and have Steam open in the background.

Links: -

https://multiup.io/be8e5aa71a9fddd71878e098ab2ec8c9

https://t.me/driftyrepacks/40

docs.title: Lethal Company [drifty repack] updated to v50
docs.text:
Lethal Company [drifty repack] has been updated to v50 with the latest patch.

Just unpack this latest version and delete your older version to continue playing the game with the latest version.

Keep Steam open before launching the game.

Download Size: 315 MB

Unpacked Size: 977 MB

Online fix from online-fix.me, they are invaluable because of their fixes.

Start Steam (please keep Steam open while playing) and click on "Lethal Company.exe" to play. Only works with other people who have the same repack. Official servers do not work.

Direct download: - https://bin.nixnet.services/?9a9b2d770b66b036#5arwSp94NiX76bHPLLDZsA6LsjhRdSoCNzoThsWMhPA4

docs.title: Nickelodeon All Star Brawl 2 (online fixed) [drifty repack] updated to v1.6.0
docs.text:
Nickelodeon All Star Brawl 2 [drifty repack] has been updated to v1.6.0 Build 13373067 with the latest patch.

Just unpack this latest version and delete your older version to continue playing the game with the latest version.

Keep Steam open before launching the game.

docs.title: Turnip Boy Games [drifty repack]
docs.text:
TB1 - v1.1.3f1 build9580945 and TB2 - v1.0.0.s0 build13198148 has been uploaded.

Download Size: 1 GB

Unpacked Size: 1.8 GB

To start the games: -

- Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion - click the "Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion.exe" file inside the "Turnip.Boy.Commits.Tax.Evasion.Build.9580945.Win64" folder to play the games

- Turnip Boy Robs a Bank - click the "Click me to run the game.exe" file inside the "Turnip.Boy.Robs.a.Bank.Build.13198148.Win64" folder to play the game

Links: -

https://bin.003274.xyz/doc/dolmtfqt

docs.title: Downloading
docs.text: • Audiobook Bay

docs.title: Android
docs.text: I mainly deal with patching and releasing the latest version of modified YouTube (ReVanced, RVX or ReX).

docs.title: GitHub Releases
docs.text:
I host barebones repositories that are compatible with Obtanium for automatic updates on Android phones. They are as follows: -

  • YouTube builds
  • YouTube Music builds
  • MiXplorer releases (to be established)

docs.title: Telegram Releases
docs.text:
• YouTube builds - here or in the ReVanced builds topic here
  • Spotify builds from xManager (essentially a repost channel) - here
  • Minecraft (MCPE) with working online - here

docs.title: Reddit / Lemmy Releases
docs.text:
• I release my YouTube builds for people who are not super tech savvy and rely on Reddit for updates here as a fallback (I am u/fakedoorsarereal).
  • I also release them on Lemmy regularly here.

docs.title: Deta Space
docs.text: I have setup quite a few projects that run on Deta's cloud and they are more or less stable to use.

docs.title: Utilities
docs.text:
• Wastebin (Open Source pastebin alternative)
  • URL Shortener (closed to the public)
  • Snapdrop
  • VSCode Online

docs.title: Privacy focused stuff
docs.text:
• Ultraviolet Proxy
  • Cobalt Proxy

docs.title: iOS
docs.text: I mainly deal with sideloading on a very surface level that too.

docs.title: AltStore Source Viewer
docs.text: • I run this project on my own in two versions - GitHub pages version and Cloudflare Pages version.

docs.title: Repositories (AltStore, Esign, TrollApps)
docs.text:
• I update my AltStore Repository regularly whith a bunch of usefull sideloadable apps.

    Pure JSON link to this is - https://driftywinds.github.io/AltStore/apps.json

  • If the AltStore Repository does not work already, I have dedicated repos for ESign and TrollApps too.

  • I have an alternate AltStore repo specifically for YTLitePlus.

docs.title: Mirrors / Backups
docs.text: • Mirrors to all of the above exist as a file server here and on Telegram here.

docs.title: Useful links for sideloading
docs.text:
Here are some of the resources I have started depending on for my sideloading needs.

  • uYouEnhanced GitHub repo
  • YTLitePlus GitHub repo
  • AppTesters Telegram Group with IPA decryptor bot
  • armconverter site with decrypted IPAs

docs.title: Miscellaneous
docs.text: Here is some stuff I host on VPSs.

docs.title: Utilities
docs.text:
• My Bitwarden Instance (closed to the public)
  • movie-web instance
  • year progress bar and month progress bar

  • custom progress bar (repo)

    Customize "My%20Project" for title and start and end dates in the URL to make your own progress bar of a time perod in this template: -

    https://progress.003274.xyz/?title=My%20Project&startdate=2023-02-05&enddate=2024-04-06

  • Cobalt Downloader (supports downloading from a bunch of social media websites)

docs.title: Software
docs.text: • Auto-updating Cromite for PC (just extract the latest release and run chrlauncher.exe in \chrlauncher\64\ everytime to update and run Cromite)

docs.title: Games
docs.text: • Wordle (can die anytime lol)
